short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the current bitcoin gold price from multiple sources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bitcoin Gold (BTG) Price is a chrome extension that provides you with the latest Bitcoin Gold Price average accross the markets.

This extension includes:
- Information Icon - displays Bitcoin Gold price in real-time
